1094648911053111296.text: We're still out here today at #TABConf2019! Stop by, say hey and demo the new super-app that will give you a unique experience of the @openbazaar marketplace & network on your mobile device pic.twitter.com/XXxa9kMGRV

1112645035168653314.text: The Services team at @OB1Company is cruising at max velocity. We've got so many improvements in the pipeline it's astonishing. I'm so thankful for the work of @StevieZollo and the others contributing to our team. OpenBazaar content services will be the best in the industry!

1116951303270223873.text:
Finally met @drwasho in person! Here he is getting us up to speed on what’s going on witb @openbazaar and @OB1Company Ethereum integrations 
#EDCON2019 @Linktimetechpic.twitter.com/8kv7lVoY72

1111600877578522624.text: The case against Facebook and Google for their commodification of our data is clear and alarming. As we move forward blockchain based social media, inherently private, will become widespread. @OB1Company is leading the way with @HavenPrivacy; this is the potential of #blockchain.https://twitter.com/SamHarrisOrg/status/1111014938489700352 …

1121548215042625537.text: #Privacy might seem like a simple concept at first. If you have control over the information you want to share — or don’t want to share — with others, then you have privacy. But this quickly becomes complicated in the real world. https://link.medium.com/rvTg2N5ybW pic.twitter.com/3drBGqljMb
